janus.services.workflow_collect_qc_services module¶

Balsamic Collect QC service.

class janus.services.workflow_collect_qc_services.BalsamicCollectQCService[source]¶

Bases: WorkflowCollectQCService

Balsamic Collect QC service.

This class provides a way to collect and process data for Balsamic workflows. It inherits from WorkflowCollectQCService, which provides common functionality for collecting data.

See also

WorkflowCollectQCService

get_case_info(request: CollectQCRequest) → Balsamic[source]¶

Collect MultiQC metrics for the Balsamic workflow.

This method takes a CollectQCRequest object and returns an instance of the Balsamic class. It collects data from various sources, including case metrics, sample IDs, and workflows.

Parameters:

request (CollectQCRequest) – A CollectQCRequest object containing relevant information.

Returns:

An instance of the Balsamic class with collected data.

Return type:

Balsamic

class janus.services.workflow_collect_qc_services.WorkflowCollectQCService[source]¶

Bases: ABC

Abstract class for workflow collect QC service.

This abstract base class provides a common interface for collecting quality control data in workflows. It defines a single method, get_case_info, which must be implemented by any concrete subclass.

Note

This is an abstract class and cannot be instantiated directly. Instead, it should be inherited to create concrete subclasses that implement the required methods.

get_case_info(request: CollectQCRequest) → None[source]¶

Get the case information.

This method takes a CollectQCRequest object as input and performs any necessary data collection or processing. It is intended for implementation by concrete subclasses of this abstract class.

Parameters:

request (CollectQCRequest) – A CollectQCRequest object containing relevant information.

Returns:

None

Return type:

NoneType
